document_data.name: Massospondylus
document_data.mainbody: '''Massospondylus''', also known as '''massopondylus''' ({{Pronounce|m@ss|o|PAN|du|luss|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|28}}}}), was a species of [[dinosaur]].
document_data.Description: Massospondylus had long teeth that were very sharp. They also had long, sharp claws on their five-fingered hands, with a large spike at the end of their thumb.
document_data.Behaviour: Massospondylus were known for not being very intelligent.
document_data.Combat: Massospondylus used their sharp teeth as a defensive weapon, biting quickly before making their escape. They were among the favored prey of several carnosaurs such as [[allosaurus]], [[deinonychus]] and [[tyrannosaurus]].
document_data.Biology: Massospondylus were herbivores and lived in herds. Similar to some avian species, they consumed stones which aided their digestion of vegetation.
